Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~CPU:1~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Money Back Guarantee~[;]~Equipment:Spreadsheet Error~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Bull Horns~[;]~Equipment:Bear Claws~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~CPU:1~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Angel Investor~[;]~Upgrade~]);
Script: Start Game: Rules.addplayerinnatestatus(~robotreunion~); Rules.includerareenemies = false; Rules.excludeenemies(getcolumn(loaddata(~diceydungeons/excludedenemies~)[;] ~robot~)); self.usecpuinsteadofdice = true; Rules.reunioncoinmode = true; Rules.playerdicerange([1[;]2]); Rules.jackpotsubstitutecard = ~Jackpot@coin~;
